概述  软件包   类  使用  树  已过时  索引  帮助 
 上一个类   下一个类 框架    无框架    
摘要： 嵌套 | 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法 详细信息： 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法

java.util.concurrent.atomic
类 AtomicReferenceArray<E>

java.lang.Object
  java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicReferenceArray<E>
类型参数：
E - The base class of elements held in this array
所有已实现的接口：
Serializable
public class AtomicReferenceArray<E>
extends Object
implements Serializable

An array of object references in which elements may be updated atomically. See the java.util.concurrent.atomic package specification for description of the properties of atomic variables.

从以下版本开始：
1.5
作者：
Doug Lea
另请参见：
序列化表格

构造方法摘要
AtomicReferenceArray(E[] array)
          Create a new AtomicReferenceArray with the same length as, and all elements copied from, the given array.
AtomicReferenceArray(int length)
          Create a new AtomicReferenceArray of given length.
 
方法摘要
 boolean compareAndSet(int i, E expect, E update)
          Atomically set the value to the given updated value if the current value == the expected value.
 E get(int i)
          Get the current value at position i.
 E getAndSet(int i, E newValue)
          Set the element at position i to the given value and return the old value.
 int length()
          Returns the length of the array.
 void set(int i, E newValue)
          Set the element at position i to the given value.
 String toString()
          Returns the String representation of the current values of array.
 boolean weakCompareAndSet(int i, E expect, E update)
          Atomically set the value to the given updated value if the current value == the expected value.
 
从类 java.lang.Object 继承的方法

构造方法详细信息

AtomicReferenceArray

public AtomicReferenceArray(int length)
Create a new AtomicReferenceArray of given length.

参数：
length - the length of the array

AtomicReferenceArray

public AtomicReferenceArray(E[] array)
Create a new AtomicReferenceArray with the same length as, and all elements copied from, the given array.

参数：
array - the array to copy elements from
抛出：
NullPointerException - if array is null
方法详细信息

length

public final int length()
Returns the length of the array.

返回：
the length of the array

get

public final E get(int i)
Get the current value at position i.

参数：
i - the index
返回：
the current value

set

public final void set(int i,
                      E newValue)
Set the element at position i to the given value.

参数：
i - the index
newValue - the new value

getAndSet

public final E getAndSet(int i,
                         E newValue)
Set the element at position i to the given value and return the old value.

参数：
i - the index
newValue - the new value
返回：
the previous value

compareAndSet

public final boolean compareAndSet(int i,
                                   E expect,
                                   E update)
Atomically set the value to the given updated value if the current value == the expected value.

参数：
i - the index
expect - the expected value
update - the new value
返回：
true if successful. False return indicates that the actual value was not equal to the expected value.

weakCompareAndSet

public final boolean weakCompareAndSet(int i,
                                       E expect,
                                       E update)
Atomically set the value to the given updated value if the current value == the expected value. May fail spuriously.

参数：
i - the index
expect - the expected value
update - the new value
返回：
true if successful.

toString

public String toString()
Returns the String representation of the current values of array.

覆盖：
类 Object 中的 toString
返回：
the String representation of the current values of array.
